WorkItem.Description: When I loaded the attached xml file and hit optimize, it said that using Enlightenment and Flame Leviathan Fueling Manual was part of the optimum gear combination.  I double-checked, and it knows that Enlightenment is a two-handed item.  It should never allow an off-hand and a two-handed weapon to be equipped at the same time.
WorkItem.Summary: [Base] Equips 2h item and off-hand when optimizing

Comments.Message: This is working as intended. Offhand items are equippable along with two hand weapons in Rawr, for comparison purposes (so you can usefully compare 1H weapons to 2H weapons), but does not include the stats of the offhand item in calculations.
Any chance we could add some sort of tooltip explaining this?  I know we're graying out the box, but that's obviously not getting the message across to our new users.

Could we replace the standard tooltip with one that says something along the lines of "This slot has been deactivated due to the presence of a 2-handed weapon in the mainhand slot.  This item's data is still actively considered when comparing a one-handed weapon in the mainhand against the currently equipped mainhand."?   Or whatever.
That would be for the grayed-out OH slot.  Don't know if it can be done or not, just a potential solution.
